original_title: American Dad XXX: An Exquisite Films Parody
overview: Steve's 18th birthday is coming up, and Stan, annoyed that his son is still a hopeless geek, plots to get Steve laid. Meanwhile, Hayley becomes a stripper (with Roger as her "manager") to raise funds for her latest hippie endeavor.
title: American Dad XXX: An Exquisite Films Parody
